attributes.action: Make all digital TV channels add Subtitles to all TV programmes
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: People who are deaf and hard of hearing do not have a wide range of choice what to watch on digital TV as only a selected few programmes are subtitled. All we are asking for is to make digital Tv companies subtitle  100% of programmes to give us the choice to watch what we want, hearing people take this for granted.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Make all digital TV channels add Subtitles to all TV programmes."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page14993.asp
